programme.title: Looking For Jacques
programme.desc: Based on a book and an original TV series from the 80s, Carina is a journalist digging into the disappearance of Jacques, a successful author. She is desperate for a juicy story to land a great job but the more she finds out, the less she wants to share.

programme.title: Murders on the Frioul Islands
programme.desc: When a renowned editor is found dead on stage during a play, young Captain Victor Mariani is put in charge of the case. But tensions rise and secrets surface when his father Pierre, a retired commissioner and old friend of the victim, joins the case.

programme.title: The Uninvited Guest
programme.desc: In this suspense thriller, Felix, an architect, lets a stranger into his home to use his phone. When the man suddenly disappears inside the house, Felix finds himself in in a cat and mouse chase and his house becomes a maze.

programme.title: Sarah Kohr: Ghosts Of The Past
programme.desc: Ex-gang leader Degen escapes prison after 19 years, putting inspector Sarah Kohr and prosecutor Anton Mehringer in danger. Unable to count on the authorities without risking their secrets, they must confront their pasts when Degen kidnaps Anton's son.

programme.title: Black Snow
programme.desc: Gosha is a trucker in northern Yakutia, who supplies his community with food, alongside low quality vodka which contributes to their alcoholism. When his truck breaks down during one of his trips, he finds himself alone in the wilderness.

programme.title: Murder Up North: Sievers And The Golden Fish
programme.desc: A popular Physics teacher is found dead following an experiment gone wrong. Could his death merely be an accident or could it have been a result of foul play? Things become more complicated when a rumour of a teacher-student affair surfaces.

programme.title: Happier Times, Grump
programme.desc: When Grump's wife dies, he sees no reason to live on. But just as his coffin is finished, Grump gets a new spark and a major secret! His teenage granddaughter is in trouble and needs help and wisdom from her grandfather, and the warmth of his fireplace.

programme.title: Temporaries
programme.desc: Ariane gets a job as an interpreter at a food plant after moving back to the Richelieu Valley following a breakup. There, she finds herself torn between obeying the harsh demands of her boss and standing up for the exploited migrant workers she befriends.

programme.title: Natatorium
programme.desc: Lilja stays with her estranged grandparents while she auditions for a performance group. When her dad and aunt find out, a sense of panic arises. Dark secrets emerge from the household that threaten to destroy her future career and her life.

programme.title: Sarah Kohr: Ghost Lights
programme.desc: In a post-pandemic Europe, conspiracy theorist Felix Morgenroth becomes obsessed with exposing the "coronavirus lie." Convinced that physicians Carsten and Lisa Kippmann were behind the conspiracy, Felix seeks retribution through a devastating explosion.

programme.title: Looking For Jacques
programme.desc: Based on a book and an original TV series from the 80s, Carina is a journalist digging into the disappearance of Jacques, a successful author. She is desperate for a juicy story to land a great job but the more she finds out, the less she wants to share.

programme.title: What's for Dinner, Mom?
programme.desc: Sisters Tae and Yo return to their childhood home and discover a box of recipes and letters from their late Japanese mother. As Tae uncovers her mothers hidden struggles, she journeys to Taiwan to retrace her past through memory and food.

programme.title: The Treasure
programme.desc: Dao Luat and her ex, Tu Cong, embark on a treasure hunt in a cursed mountain. Within the cave system, the line between reality and illusion blurs as they confront twisted versions of each other while time seems to fall apart.

programme.title: La La La at Rock Bottom
programme.desc: After his release from prison, Shigeo loses his memory in a brutal attack. Taken in by Kasumi, he becomes the lead singer of a band and lives a new life- until memories of his dark past begin to return.

programme.title: Love At First Fight
programme.desc: Between his friends and the family business, Arnaud's summer looks set to be a peaceful one. Peaceful until he runs into Madeleine, as beautiful as she is brusque, a concrete block of tensed muscles and doomsday prophecies.

programme.title: LEGO Masters USA S3 - EP 7
programme.desc: This returning series brings imagination, design and creativity to life when teams of LEGO enthusiasts go head-to-head, with infinite possibilities and anunlimited supply of LEGO bricks. Teams of two will compete against each other in ambitious brick-building challenges to be crowned the country's most talented amateur LEGO builders.

programme.title: The Professor & The Madman
programme.desc: Professor James Murray begins work compiling words for the first edition of the Oxford English Dictionary in the mid-19th century, and receives over 10,000 entries from a patient at Broadmoor Criminal Lunatic Asylum, Dr. William Minor.

programme.title: Bake Off: The Professionals S2 - EP 1
programme.desc: The toughest Bake Off of them all is back again. Twelve teams from across Britain compete to craft exquisite entremets, delicious desserts and spectacular showpieces. Who will impress world-renowned judges Benoit Blin and Cherish Finden, and be crowned the winner?

programme.title: Cooking Up A Fortune - EP 9
programme.desc: Brand new series where the UK's most passionate cooks get a once-in-a-lifetime chance to launch their own food brand to the British public. Cooking Up a Fortune sees amateur foodies, who dream of escaping the rat race and cooking for a living, create and sell their dishes to hundreds of real diners in a purpose-built food arena. Each week the winning kitchen gets to launch their idea for a food business to paying customers in one of Europe's busiest food markets.

programme.desc: Yuze chases Shan Fan, and Zhengyi later sees Shan Fan using the money to bribe Yuze in hope that Yuze will let him go. In the midst of chaos, Zhengyi realises that Yuze and Shan Fan have disappeared, along with the money. Only a patch of blood is left behind.

programme.title: The Homecoming - EP 9
programme.desc: Dong Weihong returns to Singapore from the United States with his 9-year-old son after many years. He catches up with his old-time buddies, Chen Hanyuan, Lai Guoqiang and Huang Zhenfa to reminisce the past. Although they shared a secret past, they have now taken different paths in their life. Weihong helps in Zhenfa's car dealing business, while Hanyuan is a successful lawyer. Guoqiang earns his livelihood as a hired "scapegoat" for criminals.

programme.title: Murder Up North: Sievers And The Golden Fish
programme.desc: A popular Physics teacher is found dead following an experiment gone wrong. Could his death merely be an accident or could it have been a result of foul play? Things become more complicated when a rumour of a teacher-student affair surfaces.

programme.title: Temporaries
programme.desc: Ariane gets a job as an interpreter at a food plant after moving back to the Richelieu Valley following a breakup. There, she finds herself torn between obeying the harsh demands of her boss and standing up for the exploited migrant workers she befriends.

programme.title: Sarah Kohr: Ghost Lights
programme.desc: In a post-pandemic Europe, conspiracy theorist Felix Morgenroth becomes obsessed with exposing the "coronavirus lie." Convinced that physicians Carsten and Lisa Kippmann were behind the conspiracy, Felix seeks retribution through a devastating explosion.

programme.title: The Kiss
programme.desc: In 1913 Denmark, young officer Anton grapples with duty and love when he befriends Baron von Lvenskjold's daughter, Edith, confined to a wheelchair. As their bond deepens, Anton is ensnared in a web of promises and lies, torn between pity and true love.

programme.title: What's for Dinner, Mom?
programme.desc: Sisters Tae and Yo return to their childhood home and discover a box of recipes and letters from their late Japanese mother. As Tae uncovers her mothers hidden struggles, she journeys to Taiwan to retrace her past through memory and food.

A traffic accident in which Camilla, a lawyer, is involved results in the death of a young man. This forces her to investigate and face unfamiliar places and situations. While on this journey, she will meet Bruno and rediscover herself.

programme.title: The Treasure
programme.desc: Dao Luat and her ex, Tu Cong, embark on a treasure hunt in a cursed mountain. Within the cave system, the line between reality and illusion blurs as they confront twisted versions of each other while time seems to fall apart.

programme.title: La La La at Rock Bottom
programme.desc: After his release from prison, Shigeo loses his memory in a brutal attack. Taken in by Kasumi, he becomes the lead singer of a band and lives a new life- until memories of his dark past begin to return.

programme.title: Take It Or Leave it
programme.desc: 30-year-old construction worker Erik suddenly finds himself a single parent when his ex-girlfriend, whom he hasnt seen for six months, has a baby girl and informs him that shell put the child up for adoption unless he wants to take care of his daughter.

programme.title: Love At First Fight
programme.desc: Between his friends and the family business, Arnaud's summer looks set to be a peaceful one. Peaceful until he runs into Madeleine, as beautiful as she is brusque, a concrete block of tensed muscles and doomsday prophecies.

programme.title: The Exception
programme.desc: Four women working at an NGO investigating war crimes are shaken when two of them receive death threats. While they Initially blame a Serbian war criminal, their suspicions turn on each other when a case of bullying in the office escalates.

programme.title: Timeline
programme.desc: A romantic reunion turns into a life-or-death game of secrets and survival, where the past cannot stay hidden.

programme.title: Forgive Me. Thank You.
programme.desc: A computer science fresh graduate finds himself unable to secure a job due to his deafness. The discrimination he faces forces him to confront his anxieties and take control of his own destiny.

programme.title: Murder Up North: Sievers And The Deadly Turquoise
programme.desc: When the corpse of a famous art expert was discovered in the dunes, Sievers and Ina are tasked to pursue any possible leads. However, findings of turquoise-coloured particles on the corpse point to the investigation of a long-lost painting
